comment._content:
This is super:  for ages I have been thinking what to do with those wonderful spools of threads whenever I came to pass one of those shops. Recently I found a wonderful one in Burgundy/ France and we have a very good one in Munich, too. You must either have a good connection to the producers or a lot of money or be lucky enough to get the left over from a factory that moved to India. I´d like to come and see. Post the catalogue on flickr please or send a mail to gumtau@web.de
Thanks.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content: Devorah's work is partially funded by Coats & Clark, "America's #1 name in needlecraft and sewing products." For this company, Devorah is one of the top 10 thread buyer's in the world! You can hear her talk about this in the Brooklyn Museum podcast "The Eye of the Artist: The Work of Devorah Sperber" at www.brooklynmuseum.org/exhibitions/sperber/podcast.php. Thanks for talking to us and I hope that you get to experience one of these beautiful installation's in person one day! Best, Nicole J. Caruth Exhibition Co-Curator
